admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The Manila Urban Development Project
            includes: (a) construction of water supply, sewerage,
            surface-water drainage, roads, footpaths and street lighting
            and a line of credit for housing materials; (b) provision of
            serviced lots and core units; (c) provision of community
            facilities, including educational facilities and community
            centers; upgrading and construction of a new health center;
            preventive health programs and services, identification and
            treatment of all malnourished children, infant food
            preparation, nutrition education for mothers, immunization,
            deworming, vermin and rodent control campaigns, food
            supplement programs, a family planning campaign, and
            monitoring and evaluation programs; (d) provision of new
            industrial/commercial sites, of mixed commercial/residential
            land, a vocational and skills training program, a pilot
            scheme for a cottage industry line of credit; (e)
            rehabilitation of an existing pumping station and provision
            of a new outfall sewer; construction of stabilization ponds
            and temporary watermains; (f) road construction and
            rehabilitation; (g) provision of traffic signals, equipment
            for a central traffic control center, mobile radios for
            police traffic control, geometric improvements of junctions,
            road marking paint; improvement of footpaths, and
            construction of bus shelter.
